name: Arisanna, Herbalist Prodigy
effect: b'On Enter: Gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'
flavor_text: b'"Adjuvants, catalysts, and materia abound! This world offers so much potential for research and experimentation. Now, what about this mixture?"'

name: Arisanna, Master Alchemist
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage (Arisanna, Master Alchemist must be leveled from a previous level "Arisanna" champion.)\nOn Enter: Gather twice.\nInherited Effect: At the beginning of your end phase, you may sacrifice two Herbs with the same name. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Arisanna, Lucent Arbiter
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage \n3, REST: Reveal the top card of your deck. Negate target card activation if its reserve cost is equal to the reserve cost of the revealed card.'
flavor_text: b'"By the moon\'s call, you will be judged."'

name: Diana, Keen Huntress
effect: b"Lineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Materialize a Gun card from your material deck. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b'A talented archer in a past life, her mastery of firearms came naturally while on Azoth. '

name: Diana, Deadly Duelist
effect: b'Diana Lineage (Diana, Deadly Duelist must be leveled from a previous level "Diana" champion.)\nOn Enter: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. (You still pay its costs.)\nInherited Effect: Ranged 2'

name: Diana, Cursebreaker
effect: b'Diana Lineage\nBanish all Curse cards from Diana\'s lineage: Materialize two Bullet cards from your material deck. Until end of turn, Diana gains "On Attack: Wake up Diana." Activate this ability only if there are four or more Curse cards in Diana\'s lineage. '

name: Tonoris, Lone Mercenary
effect: b"On Enter: Tonoris gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.)
flavor_text: b'Exiled and purged, he searches for his own truth.'

name: Tonoris, Might of Humanity
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage (Tonoris, Might of Humanity must be leveled from a previous level "Tonoris" champion.)\nOn Enter: Tonoris\' next attack this turn gets +3 power.'
flavor_text: b"With replenished strength, Tonoris serves as a beacon of hope for humanity's salvation.

name: Tonoris, Creation's Will
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage\nIf you would summon one or more tokens, you may summon that many Aurousteel Greatsword tokens instead.\nToken weapons you control have "Sacrifice this object: Target weapon gets +X power until end of turn where X is this object\'s power."'

name: Crimson Tear
effect: b"[Level 1+] As long as Crimson Tear is attacking or retaliating against a Human, Crimson Tear gets +1 power. \n[Level 2+] Whenever you activate a Reaction card that targets Crimson Tear, draw a card into your memory. Then if it's not your turn, wake up Crimson Tear.

name: Dahlia, Idyllic Dreamer
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Attack: Look at the top card of your deck. If it's a water element card, you may put it into your graveyard.\nDahlia has ranged X, where X is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard.

name: Rose, Eternal Paragon
effect: b'Intercept, True Sight\n[Class Bonus] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)\n[Level 2+] On Enter: You may change the target of an attack to Rose. If you do, Rose gets +1 life until end of turn.'

name: Claude, Fated Visionary
effect: b'On Enter: Put the top LV cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then return up to two Automaton ally cards from your graveyard to your memory.\nAutomaton allies you control have taunt and "On Death: Glimpse 3."'
